name: firefox
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "68.4.1esr" %}

package:
  name: firefox
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://ftp.mozilla.org/pub/firefox/releases/{{ version }}/linux-x86_64/en-US/firefox-{{ version }}.tar.bz2  # [linux64]
  sha256: 538356112b407925959aeaf00bb3897922b7e49e4354b67b0c44733d198a2815  # [linux64]

  fn: firefox.pkg  # [osx]
  url: https://ftp.mozilla.org/pub/firefox/releases/{{ version }}/mac/en-US/Firefox%20{{ version }}.pkg  # [osx]
  sha256: f6438f128fb5b85e3b91d77103327bf8c941df45abe5bc602950335699f7eb44  # [osx]

  fn: firefox.msi  # [win]
  url: https://ftp.mozilla.org/pub/firefox/releases/{{ version }}/win64/en-US/Firefox%20Setup%20{{ version }}.msi  # [win]
  sha256: b3c5f75e7a058e458ee078575aed7c377fc80d33981bebc9c16b91c89020ce41  # [win]

build:
  number: 0
  binary_relocation:
    - bin/firefox

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ compiler('c') }}
    - {{ compiler('cxx') }}

test:
  requires:
    - selenium
    - geckodriver

about:
  home: https://www.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/releases
  license: MPL-2.0
  license_family: MOZILLA
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: 'Firefox web browser'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - birdsarah
    - ocefpaf
    - bollwyvl
